ISSUE.TITLE: Increased memory
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40.0-4.40.2 It should not take so much memory. The issue is related to moving away from Autofac to the default ASP.NET DI

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #5545 Fixed searching problem of orders in the admin area when filter by a warehouse (cherry picked from commit 7a04c3446cf7a4884bb519d280964c6fbfc61a7d)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5586 Using of Autofac above the internal DI (cherry picked from commit 206d120c0ccfd8b9c2c78235e19204facb4e5852)
